intro.text: «Vostok-Medservice» is a specialized company in the field of traumatology, orthopedics and neurosurgery, as well as the exclusive representative of the Hungarian manufacturing plant Medimetal Kft in Ukraine, which manufactures thousands of implants from high-quality stainless steel and titanium. Our company offers a wide range of medical equipment and surgical instruments. The main advantages of the products offered by Vostok-Medservice are the ratio of high quality, affordable price, as well as a convenient, intuitive instrument for the doctor.

intro-mobile.text: A specialized company in the field of traumatology, orthopedics and neurosurgery, which offers a wide range of medical equipment and surgical instruments

surgery.title: Surgery
surgery.text: Modern sewing materials; polymer endoprostheses - meshes for hernioplasty
surgery.textMain: Vostok-Medservice LLC represents one of the leading Russian manufacturers of surgical materials on the Ukrainian market - the Lintex enterprise. Our assortment includes modern surgical suture materials, polymer endoprostheses-mesh (surgical mesh) for hernioplasty (surgical treatment of abdominal hernias), systems for the surgical treatment of stress urinary incontinence in women and men (stress urinary incontinence), surgical correction of prolapses (prolapses) of the pelvic organs (uterine prolapse, cystocele, rectocele, enterocele), means for the prevention of postoperative adhesions and the treatment of 'adhesive disease' , biologically active wound dressings, and other surgical materials. All products have registration certificates and certificates of conformity. Strict quality control at all stages of the technological process is the basis of the production activities of LLC Lintex. production and sale of medical devices is evaluated and meets the requirements of Russian and international standards: ISO 9001:2001 in the GOST R system, EN ISO 9001:2001 in the Swiss SAS system, EN ISO 13485:2003 in the Swiss SAS system. »has the CE mark - a sign of compliance with the requirements of the European Directive 93/42/EEC on safety for medical devices. Scientific research is one of the priorities of Lintex LLC. 22 patents of the Russian Federation have been introduced into production. Joint research is actively conducted with leading scientific and clinical medical organizations.

airSterilizerNotPassableData.title: Designed to sterilize medical devices by exposing them to hot air at a given temperature for a given time. It can also be used for drying. High level of automation, optimal air circulation and high quality thermal insulation guarantee economical and reliable operation. The safety of the operation is ensured by a temperature lock and a safety alarm. The bactericidal filter protects the sterility of the products during cooling.
airSterilizerNotPassableData.airSterilizerNotPassableData1: Conditional volume of the chamber, l:
airSterilizerNotPassableData.airSterilizerNotPassableData2: Chamber dimensions (w, h, d), mm (two compartments):
airSterilizerNotPassableData.airSterilizerNotPassableData6: Temperature deviation by chamber volume from the set value, °С:

airSterilizerUkraineData.title: Used in medical and preventive institutions, laboratories, pharmacies, dental clinics, veterinary, etc. Can be used in food, confectionery, chemical industry. Owing to the high technical parameters it can be used for scientific and laboratory researches. Distinctive features Automatic adjustment of the operating parameters; Microprocessor control; Forced convection by silent fan; The chamber is made of stainless steel; Power supply from AC single-phase network (220±22) V, frequency (50±1) Hz. Fixed emergency overheat protection at 230ºC Operating modes:
airSterilizerUkraineData.airSterilizerUkraineData05: Two modes, programmable without saving after power failure
airSterilizerUkraineData.airSterilizerUkraineData5: Temperature deviation by chamber volume from the set value, °С

airSterilizerGP.airSterilizerGpData5: Temperature deviation by chamber volume from the set value, °С
airSterilizerGP.text1: Air sterilizers are designed for sterilization, drying and disinfection of various medical instruments and materials.
airSterilizerGP.text2: They are produced in two versions: without cooling (2 sterilization cycles per work shift) and with additional forced cooling (4 sterilization cycles per work shift).
airSterilizerGP.text3: The peculiarity of the sterilizers in the version with forced cooling is the presence of an effective system of forced cooling, which eliminates the use of cold air to the sterilized material and bactericidal filters, which cuts the sterilization time almost in half. The cooling time of the loaded sterilizer with forced cooling to +60°C is no more than 30 min.
airSterilizerGP.text4: Application field: Used in medical and preventive institutions, dental clinics, pharmacies, etc. They can be used in chemical industry and other branches of industry and in household establishments. The sterilizers can be completed with a floor stand.
airSterilizerGP.text6: - Automatic regulation and maintenance of temperature;
airSterilizerGP.text7: - Automatic countdown and indication of set time intervals;
airSterilizerGP.text8: - Uniform temperature distribution throughout the volume of the chamber;
airSterilizerGP.text9: - forced cooling via additional cooling circuit;
airSterilizerGP.text10: - door handle ensures easy and reliable closing;
airSterilizerGP.text11: - High reliability is ensured by testing all products under high temperature and vibration conditions and by careful selection of imported components;

sterilizationCabinet.title: SHS-80 is designed for drying, air sterilization and disinfection of glass and metal utensils, heat-resistant syringes, surgical and other instruments. The cabinet is used in hospitals, polyclinics, pharmacies, institutes and other medical institutions. The drying chamber of the cabinet and the trays are made of stainless steel.

electricSterilizers320.text1: The sterilizer is designed for use in hospitals, clinics and laboratories to sterilize small instruments, utensils, containers and some other medical devices.
electricSterilizers320.text2: The heating element is a 1000 W electric heating tube installed in the middle of the lower part of the housing. When current flows through the tube, it heats and provides water heating at a high kcd level. It is possible to set the duration of the sterilization. After the set time has elapsed, the power supply is automatically cut off.
electricSterilizers320.text3: It is recommended to use treated water such as sterilized, deionized or boiled. This will avoid damage to the appliance through the formation of scale. Under normal conditions (at a boiling temperature of 100 C and atmospheric pressure of 760 mmHg) the standard duration of the sterilization procedure is 20-30 minutes, which ensures the destruction of the prevailing number of microbes.

sterilizationBoxesRound.text1: The boxes are designed for sterilization in steam sterilizers, storage and delivery to the place of use of dressing material, surgical linen, heat-resistant syringes, surgical and other medical items.
sterilizationBoxesRound.text2: The boxes provide sterility of materials for at least 3 days.
sterilizationBoxesRound.text3: They are made of stainless steel. The boxes are used in clinics, hospitals and other medical institutions.
sterilizationBoxesRound.text4: Specifications: Volume, cubic dm - from 3 to 18

formalinChamberBig.title: The chamber is designed for sterilization and storage (transportation) of medical drills, saws and other tools. Sterilization is carried out in vapor of paraform or liquid formalin. The chamber is made of aluminum alloy and organic glass with a clamp for a saw or drill and other surgical instruments.

electric7a23v.text1: Medical suction unit is designed for suctioning air and fluid from wounds and cavities during surgical operations and in the postoperative period in medical institutions.
electric7a23v.text2: - The oil-free piston vacuum pump operates without the use of steam or lubricants;
electric7a23v.text3: - Manual and foot switch for easy and convenient operation;
electric7a23v.text4: - Vacuum system can be adjusted to suit the application;
electric7a23v.text6: - All-plastic outer casing provides excellent corrosion protection and is easily disinfected;

electric7a23d.text1: Medical suction unit is designed for suctioning air and fluid from wounds and cavities during surgical operations and in the postoperative period in medical institutions.
electric7a23d.text2: - The oil-free piston vacuum pump operates without the use of steam or lubricants;
electric7a23d.text3: - Manual and foot switch for easy and convenient operation;
electric7a23d.text4: - Vacuum pressure adjustment depending on the specific application;
electric7a23d.text5: - Portable, metal outer casing with plastic control panel;
electric7a23d.text6: - Equipped with transport handle, wheels, remote control pedal.

electric7s.subtitle: For an induced abortion
electric7s.text1: The medical abortion aspirator is designed to perform induced abortion in early pregnancy. It is used in gynecology departments of hospitals and specialized medical institutions.
electric7s.text2: - The oil-free piston vacuum pump operates without the use of lubricants;
electric7s.text3: - The manual and foot switch makes it convenient and easy to operate;
electric7s.text4: - It is possible to adjust the vacuum pressure according to the specific application;
electric7s.text5: - Portable, metal outer casing with plastic control panel;
electric7s.text6: - Equipped with transport handle, wheels and remote activation pedal;

children7eb.text1: The medical abortion aspirator is designed to perform induced abortion in early pregnancy. It is used in gynecology departments of hospitals and specialized medical institutions.
children7eb.text2: - Oil-free piston vacuum pump operates without the use of lubricants;
children7eb.text5: - Float-operated device prevents overfilling and spillage of liquid into the pump;
children7eb.text6: - Vacuum system can be adjusted to the specific application;
children7eb.text7: - Small size and low weight make the unit easy to carry;
children7eb.text8: - All-plastic outer casing offers excellent corrosion protection and is easy to clean.

universal7ed.subtitle: The 7E-D is a modern, portable medical aspirator that can operate from three types of power sources: AC, DC, and rechargeable battery.
universal7ed.text1: It is designed to provide emergency care for patients with blocked airways in hospital settings, by ambulance crews, in the home, and by health care services. This device is capable of removing secretion products, blood, and vomit that block the airways in order to resume unobstructed breathing, and is particularly useful for providing first aid and treatment to patients in transportation and in places where AC or DC power is not available.
universal7ed.text2: - Oil-free piston vacuum pump operates without the use of lubricants;
universal7ed.text4: - Float-operated device prevents liquid from getting into the pump;
universal7ed.text5: - Vacuum vacuum can be adjusted to suit the application;
universal7ed.text6: - Small size and low weight make the unit easy to carry;
universal7ed.text7: - All-plastic outer casing provides excellent corrosion protection and is easy to clean.

pedal7c.text1: The medical pedal aspirator is designed for suctioning air and fluid from wounds and cavities during uncomplicated surgical operations, during the post-operative period in medical institutions. This device is especially useful for use in providing first aid, in small rural hospitals, clinics, in remote areas with power supply problems, and for temporary use in case of power failure.

surgicalElema.text1: Designed for suctioning air and fluid from wounds and cavities during operations and in the postoperative period, as well as for any other procedures based on vacuum.

coagulator.text1: 1. The device is designed for coagulation and cutting soft tissues and vessels by high frequency current (HF) in surgery, gynecology, dentistry, cosmetology.
coagulator.text2: 2. It can be used on the premises of clinics, hospitals, hospitals.
coagulator.text3: 3. The device can be used in veterinary medicine.
coagulator.text6: 3. Monopolar instrument holder with cable (length 2.5 m)

luminaireL7412II.text1: The design of the luminaire provides great opportunities for use. The above-mentioned advantages made the luminaire convenient for use in hospitals and clinics. The shadow effect is achieved by using several light elements. The closed construction of the luminaire body makes it possible to fully meet the requirements for surgical sterility and safety. The focusing mechanism is easy to use. The handle can be removed for sterilization.
luminaireL7412II.subtitle: The shadow operating luminaire, which uses tungsten halogen lamps as a light source, is characterized by high illumination, low thermal radiation, excellent color rendering in combination with an advanced integrated balancing system and a long service life.

luminaireL200063II.text1: The L2000-6+3-II operating luminaire meets the international standards of shadowless luminaires, its mechanical characteristics meet the world analogues due to the use of CAM/CAD technology, which allows to optimize the light transmission and balancing system. The luminaire uses a halogen lamp with high light output and low thermal radiation. The large diameter reflector, made by CAM/CAD technology, has a curved surface that does not create shadows. The surface of the luminaire has a hard optical coating, which is almost wear-free. The front cover, made by PVC pressure-forming, provides light softening and serves to protect the lamps. The focusing mechanism is comfortable and easy to use.

luminaireL735II.text1: The design of the luminaire provides great possibilities for use. The above-mentioned advantages make the luminaire suitable for use in hospitals and clinics. The shadow effect is achieved by using several light-optical elements. The closed construction of the luminaire body fully meets the requirements for surgical sterility and safety. The focusing mechanism is easy to use. The handle can be removed for sterilization.
luminaireL735II.subtitle: The shadow operating luminaire, which uses tungsten halogen lamps as a light source, is characterized by high illumination, low thermal radiation, excellent color rendering in combination with an advanced integrated balancing system and a long service life.

luminaireZmdII.text1: The design of the luminaire provides great opportunities for use. The above-mentioned advantages made the luminaire suitable for use in hospitals and clinics. The shadow effect is achieved by using several light-optical elements. The closed construction of the luminaire body makes it possible to fully meet the requirements for surgical sterility and safety. The focusing mechanism is easy to use. The handle can be removed for sterilization.
luminaireZmdII.subtitle: The shadow operating luminaire, which uses tungsten halogen lamps as a light source, is characterized by high illumination, low thermal radiation, excellent color rendering in combination with an advanced integrated balancing system and a long service life.

luminaireL20006II.text1: The shadowless operating luminaire meets international standards for shadowless luminaires and meets the world analogues in its mechanical characteristics thanks to CAM/CAD technology, which allows optimizing the light output and balancing system. The luminaire uses a halogen lamp with high light output and low thermal radiation. The large-diameter reflector, made by CAM/CAD technology, has a curved surface that does not create shadows. The surface of the luminaire is made of a hard optical coating, which is almost wear-resistant. The front cover is made by pressure-forming PVC, which provides soft illumination and serves to protect the lamps. The focusing mechanism is comfortable and easy to use.

luminaireL20003II.text1: The L2000-3-II operating luminaire meets the international standards of shadowless luminaires, according to its mechanical characteristics meets the world analogues due to the CAM/CAD technology, which allows to optimize the light transmission and balancing system. The luminaire uses a halogen lamp with high light output and low thermal radiation. The large diameter reflector, made by CAM/CAD technology, has a curved surface that does not create shadows. The surface of the luminaire has a hard optical coating, which is almost wear-free. The front cover, made by PVC pressure forming, which provides softening of the light and serves to protect the lamps. The focusing mechanism is comfortable and easy to use.

luminaireL20003e.text1: The L2000-3E shadow operating light with emergency power supply is a modern design that has a vertically movable design. A powerful maintenance-free battery and a microcontroller-based control system provide fast automatic switching of power supplies. This operating light is suitable for both mains power and loss of power use and can be used in all types of medical facilities. The emergency-powered shadow operating light, through the use of a battery, provides the flexibility of movement and stability when installed on site. Under normal operating conditions, the luminaire is powered by 220 V mains voltage. For emergency lighting, a maintenance-free rechargeable battery is used for more than three hours. A built-in control system enables rapid charging and continuous recharging of the battery with extremely stable characteristics, as well as protection against overheating and short circuits. A 10-segment LED indicates the operating status and current charge of the battery pack.
luminaireL20003e.text2: - The Model L2000-3E emergency-powered shadow luminaire has an improved appearance, light source quality and design.
luminaireL20003e.text3: - The light source is a halogen lamp with high optical efficiency, low thermal radiation and good color rendering parameters.
luminaireL20003e.text4: - The large-diameter reflector made by CAM/CAD technology has a curved surface that does not create shadows.
luminaireL20003e.text5: - The surface of the luminaire has a hard optical coating, which practically does not wear out.
luminaireL20003e.text6: - The handle is made of structural plastic and is removable, which is necessary for sterilization.
luminaireL20003e.text7: - The handle is made of structural plastic and is removable, which is necessary for sterilization.
luminaireL20003e.text8: - The balancing system is optimally designed to make it fairly easy to move the lamp up and down and lock it in place.
luminaireL20003e.text9: - The listed features provide illumination that meets IEC standards.

luminaireL739II.text1: The design of the luminaire provides great opportunities for use. The above-mentioned advantages made the luminaire suitable for use in hospitals and clinics. The shadow effect is achieved by using several light-optical elements. The closed construction of the luminaire body makes it possible to fully meet the requirements for surgical sterility and safety. The focusing mechanism is easy to use. luminaireL739II.subtitle: The shadow operating luminaire, which uses tungsten halogen lamps as a light source, is characterized by high illumination, low thermal radiation, excellent color rendering in combination with an advanced integrated balancing system and a long service life.

luminaireL735E.text1: The Model L 735E shadow operating light with emergency power supply is a state-of-the-art development with a vertical, movable design. A powerful maintenance-free battery and a microcontroller-based control system provide fast automatic switching of the power sources. This operating light can be powered as well as battery operated, allowing it to be used in all types of medical facilities.
luminaireL735E.text2: The emergency-powered shadow operating light, through the use of a battery, provides ease of movement and durability when installed in the field. Under normal operating conditions, the luminaire operates with 220 V mains voltage. For emergency lighting, for more than three hours, a maintenance-free rechargeable battery is used. An integrated control system provides the ability to quickly charge and continuously recharge the battery with extremely stable characteristics, as well as protection against overheating and short circuits. A 10-segment LED indicates the operating status and current charge of the battery pack.

luminaireL734II.subtitle: The shadow operating luminaire, which uses tungsten halogen lamps as a light source, is characterized by high illumination, low thermal radiation, excellent color rendering in combination with an advanced integrated balancing system and a long service life.
luminaireL734II.text1: The compact design of the luminaire provides great opportunities for use. The aforementioned advantages made the luminaire convenient for use in hospitals, trauma clinics and consulting rooms, both in the role of the main and auxiliary apparatus. The shadow effect is achieved through the use of several light-optical elements. Closed construction of the luminaire body makes it possible to fully meet the requirements for surgical sterility and safety. The focusing mechanism is easy to use. The handle can be removed for sterilization.
luminaireL734II.text2: - Rotation of the lighting unit by 150° in two horizontal axes and by 38° relative to the vertical axis;

luminaireSPR5eEma.subtitle: Manufactured by CJSC EMA Factory, Ekaterinburg, Russia Surgical single-unit mobile lighting fitting with adjustable size of the operating field SPR-5 - E-EMA (3-reflector) is designed for lighting the operating field and backlighting as an auxiliary device during surgical operations in hospitals and dressing rooms.
luminaireSPR5eEma.text1: - Three light-optical elements with halogen lamp, interference reflectors, light filters, diffusers;
luminaireSPR5eEma.text2: - Maximum illumination of 60 klx, uniform 'cold light';
luminaireSPR5eEma.text3: - Adjusting the size of the working field of 100 to 250 mm;
luminaireSPR5eEma.text4: - Displacement of the lighting block on the height of 1.5 to 2 m;
luminaireSPR5eEma.text5: - Rotation of the lighting unit by 90o on two axes and by 60o relative to the vertical axis;
luminaireSPR5eEma.text6: - Possibility to connect the emergency power supply unit BAP-27;
luminaireSPR5eEma.text8: - Removable sterilizable handle, resistant to disinfectant solutions.
luminaireSPR5eEma.text12: - Base with power supply unit, 1 pc.

luminaireL751IISingle.text1: The compact design of the luminaire provides great versatility, flexibility of movement and stability, which increases the efficiency of the luminaire. The enclosed design of the luminaire allows you to fully meet the requirements for surgical sterility and safety. The handle can be removed for sterilization.

luminaireReflectorEEma9.subtitle: Manufactured by CJSC 'EMA plant', Ekaterinburg, Russia Stationary surgical lighting fixtures with adjustable size of operating field SR-2 (4+5) 'E-EMA' (9-reflector) are designed to illuminate the operating field during surgical operations and diagnostic research.
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text2: - Adjustable working field size from 100 to 250 mm;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text4: - Best shadow effect due to the use of several light-optical elements in each illumination unit;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text6: - Natural color rendering, the use of light filters;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text7: - Heat-absorbing interference reflectors, minimal heating of the operating field;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text8: - Lamp switches and controllers for operating field are integrated into the housings of lighting units;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text9: - High mobility of lighting blocks, possibility of rotation of consoles and hinges up to 320o;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text10: - Swivel lighting unit in two planes, vertical movement of 620 mm;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text11: - Adjustable braking systems built into the hinges, stable positioning;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text12: - Serviceable space in diameter of 2.8 m from the central suspension;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text13: - For room heights greater than 3.2 m, an additional extension is available;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text14: - Sterilizable removable handles, resistant to disinfection and easy to carry out disinfection;
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text15: - Possibility to connect the emergency power supply unit BAP-27.
luminaireReflectorEEma9.text23: - M12 studs (460mm) with nuts and washers to fix the luminaire, 4 pcs.

luminaireReflectorEEma3.subtitle: Manufactured by CJSC 'EMA Factory', Ekaterinburg, Russia Stationary surgical luminaires with adjustable size of operating field SR-5 'E-EMA' (3-reflector) are intended for illumination of operating field during surgical operations and diagnostic researches.
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text2: - Adjustable working field size from 100 to 250 mm;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text4: - Best shadow effect due to the use of several light-optical elements in each illumination unit;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text6: - Natural color rendering, the use of light filters;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text7: - Heat-absorbing interference reflectors, minimal heating of the operating field;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text8: - Lamp switches and controllers for operating field are integrated into the housings of lighting units;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text9: - High mobility of lighting blocks, possibility of rotation of consoles and hinges up to 320o;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text10: - Swivel lighting unit in two planes, vertical movement of 620 mm;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text11: - Adjustable braking systems built into the hinges, stable positioning;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text12: - Serviceable space in diameter of 2.8 m from the central suspension;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text13: - For room heights greater than 3.2 m, an additional extension is available;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text14: - Sterilizable removable handles, resistance of coatings to disinfection and its convenience;
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text15: Possibility to connect the emergency power supply unit BAP-27.
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text22: - M12 studs (460mm) with nuts and washers to fix the luminaire, 4 pcs.
luminaireReflectorEEma3.text26: - Emergency power supply unit BAP-27, 1** pcs.

block.title: Education
block.text-p1: Doctors who cooperate with «Восток-Медсервис» LLC and use the products of the Hungarian company «Medimetal» have the opportunity to undergo training in Hungary on the basis of clinics in the city of Budapest.
block.text-p2: After graduation, an international certificate is issued.
